name: Ricinus communis bofareira
Relationship: Compare: RESORCIN (summer complaint with vomiting); destroys organic germs of putrefaction; CHOLOS TERRAPINA (cramps of muscles). ARS.; VERAT.

Head: Vertigo, occipital pain, congestive symptoms, burning in ears
Face pale, twitching of mouth
Stomach: Anorexia with great thirst, burning in stomach, pyrosis, nausea, profuse vomiting, pit of stomach sensitive
Stool: Loose, incessant, painless, with painful cramps in muscles of extremities
Abdomen: Rumbling with contraction of recti muscles, colic, incessant diarrhoea with purging
Rice water stools with cramps and chilliness

details: Has marked action on gastrointestinal tract. INCREASES THE QUANTITY OF MILK in nursing women. Vomiting and purging. Languor and weakness. Diminished mammary secretion
dosage: Third potency. Five drops every four hours for increasing flow of milk; also locally a poultice of the leaves.
